name: hacktiba-2025-lab01
postCreateCommand: /bin/bash -lc "python -m pip install --upgrade pip && python -m pip install -q --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu torch && python -m pip install -q transformers"
postStartCommand:
/bin/bash -lc "python - <<'PY'
try:
  import torch, transformers
  print('✅ Torch OK:', torch.__version__, '| Transformers OK:', transformers.__version__)
except Exception as e:
  print('⚠️ Dependências ausentes, instalando...')
  import subprocess
  subprocess.check_call(['python','-m','pip','install','--index-url','https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu','torch'])
  subprocess.check_call(['python','-m','pip','install','transformers'])
  import torch, transformers
  print('✅ Reinstalado: Torch', torch.__version__, '| Transformers', transformers.__version__)
PY"
